title: Mahabaleshwar: Hire a taxi and roam around
text:
Travel Articles | October 9, 2015 
Travelling through the scenic and panoramic hill station of Mahabaleshwar is an extremely breath taking experience. The lushes green landscapes can grab the attention of any visitor and left you with numb feeling, whenever you visit Mahabaleshwar. 
Mahabaleshwar, place of great sightseeing, popular hill station, previously is the summer capital of Mumbai during British Rule. It is a hill station with an effect of rejuvenating any tourist who visits there. The beauty and evergreen forest of Western Ghats also influence its neighboring place, Mahabaleshwar and the charisma of this very place is enhanced by it green hill tops; water in every form like springs, waterfall, and streams is like a sound of nature. This place is likely to be blessed by nature in its every possible way. Travelling or Road trip to this hill station is the best way to get quench by the mesmerizing beauty of “God of Great Power” often called. If anyone wishes to roam around in and out of Mahabaleshwar then just Book a Cab, as it gives the freedom of enjoying every possible corner of this lush full and breath taking place of Mahabaleshwar. 
Once you enter this great valley one can get across by the number of tourists spots, seems to be waiting to visit. The easy way to visit all types of contrasting landscapes when one is having its own ride or car rental to fancy the panoramic view of Mahabaleshwar Hill Station with lots and lots of lavish green peaks and valley. It seems like a husky sheet of green blanket canvassing the whole panorama which makes the whole view very magical and fascinating. And if you are not hypnotize enough then move your Car Rental towards the Pratapgarh Fort, built by Chatrapati Shivaji in 1965, representing the historical aspects of Mahabaleshwar. Within Pratapgarh Fort one can also get spiritualize by visiting Bhavani Temple and Mahadev Temple. 
It is a beautiful blend of historical architecture monuments and scenic view. Articulating about the grassy picture of Mahabaleshwar Wilson Point and Mumbai Point is a much acclaimed Sunset Points visited by tons of visitors. There are also many exciting places like, Elephant’s Head Point, Elphinstone Point, Connaught Peak resided almost side by side gives the complete scenic glimpse in different aspect. Furthermore, if anyone desires to feel the tranquility of nature very closely then just Hire a Taxi or Book a Cab en route Venna Lake just an apt place for water activities or simply go round in the direction of Pratap Singh Park. 
Moreover, if you are somewhat like a meager religious soul then go for places like Krishnabai Temple and Mahabaleshwar Temple. Krishnabai Temple or Krishna Temple, also addressed as Panchganga by the locals. It is called so because it is situated on the banks of five rivers. Krishnabai Temple once built by Raja Singhandeo and renovated by great Maratha King Shivaji whereas Mahabaleshwar Temple is famous for its south Indian style of architecture. It is placed in old city of Mahabaleshwar representing the beautiful blend of religion and architecture which satiate one’s soul with ultimate safari. Undeniably this place offers a great panorama to all types of travelers like solo travelers, group trips or newlyweds. You simply got intoxicated by the scenic view of Mahabalshwar.
